name: @sullux/aws-sdk
description: A wrapper for the woefully inadequate aws-sdk library from Amazon.

scripts.package: npm run build && node ./package.js && cp README.md dist/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.deploy: npm test && npm run package && cd dist && npm publish --access public

author: Charles Sullivan <sullux@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Sullux)
